snippet.title: Competitive FPS Game Play Showcase - LIGHTNING
snippet.description:
Introduction to game play briefly showing what can be done and highlighting main features within the game, some features such as the entire team section, daily challenges and black market where you trade with other players along with other sections aren't show-cased in order to keep it short and brief.

Project code named as "Lightning" being developed by a veteran FPS player, a competitive tactical fps combining realistic settings with mystical abilities.

Stay tuned for more.

00:00 Game play
01:41 Horde Mode
01:55 Parkour
01:58 Replay System
02:04 Tournament system
02:21 Emotes
02:26 Character System
02:35 Character Customization
02:50 Weapon Customization
03:00 Outro


Background Track by https://www.youtube.com/c/SavageBeats
